mil7.3.4:1.1_0: “An elephant who regards the forest that keeps you limb?”
mil7.3.4:1.2_0: “Great king, the finest lady of the land is called a debate
mil7.3.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a disciple of the four fruits of the ascetic life, four supports has been fulfilled in empty dwellings.
mil7.3.4:1.4_0: This fine rice porridge should be thrown in one place.
mil7.3.4:1.5_0: When I said this, great king, you are senior to say,
mil7.3.4:2.4_0: a hundred years and fifty years.
mil7.3.4:3.4_0: a hundred years and fifty years.
mil7.3.4:4.1_0: I have now been great hero
